item.title: 10 Best DevOps Tools for Start-ups
item.description: OK. You are in a small start-up, and you want to move fast. To move fast, you will need automation instead of doing stuff manually. So, it would be best if you had a bunch of DevOps tools that can accelerate your software development lifecycle (SDLC.) The thing is, though, hundreds of tools can help you increase engineering productivity. Which ones to choose? That’s the million-dollar question. But worry no
